name: renkli-dunya-anaokulu
description: Modern, responsive anaokulu web sitesi - Enterprise seviyesinde

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run optimize
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: npx clean-css-cli css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.min.css && npx clean-css-cli css/admin-styles.css -o dist/css/admin-styles.min.css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser js/script.js -o dist/js/script.min.js && npx terser js/admin-script.js -o dist/js/admin-script.min.js
scripts.optimize:images: echo 'Image optimization would be implemented here'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run lint:css
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Deployment would be implemented here'
